channel.title: CVE Feed for Apple -- iTunes for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apple -- iTunes for Windows

item.title: CVE-2022-26773|2024-08-03T05:11:44.504Z -- apple -- itunes%20for%20windows
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in iTunes 12.12.4 for Windows. An application may be able to delete files for which it does not have permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-26774|2024-08-03T05:11:44.523Z -- apple -- itunes%20for%20windows
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in iTunes 12.12.4 for Windows. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2024-27793|2024-08-02T00:41:55.200Z -- apple -- itunes%20for%20windows
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iTunes 12.13.2 for Windows. Parsing a file may lead to an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-27793|2024-05-08T22:15:21.788Z -- apple -- itunes%20for%20windows
item.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iTunes 12.13.2 for Windows. Parsing a file may lead to an unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-42938|2024-03-14T18:24:02.258Z -- apple -- itunes%20for%20windows
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iTunes 12.13.1 for Windows. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-42938|2024-08-02T19:37:21.907Z -- apple -- itunes%20for%20windows
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iTunes 12.13.1 for Windows. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-48611|2024-08-03T15:17:55.508Z -- apple -- itunes%20for%20windows
item.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iTunes 12.12.4 for Windows. A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges.
